snippet: The author George R. R. Martin, the executive producer of the HBO series “Game of Thrones,” has given his fans a late Christmas gift in the form of a sample chapter from his forthcoming “Winds of Winter.”
abstract: Author George R R Martin, the executive producer of the HBO series Game of Thrones, gives his fans a treat by posting online a sample chapter from his forthcoming book Winds of Winter, the sixth book in his popular fantasy series A Song of Ice and Fire.
lead_paragraph: The author George R. R. Martin, the executive producer of the HBO series “Game of Thrones,” has given his fans a late Christmas gift in the form of a sample chapter from his forthcoming “Winds of Winter.”
